headline.main: LA Lakers' History Says They'll Find a Great With No. 2 Pick
headline.print_headline: LA Lakers' History Says They'll Find a Great With No. 2 Pick

docs.snippet: With 16 championships and a decades-long history of winning, the Los Angeles Lakers hardly ever get a shot at the NBA draft's elite talent....
docs.lead_paragraph: With 16 championships and a decades-long history of winning, the Los Angeles Lakers hardly ever get a shot at the NBA draft's elite talent.

headline.main: Governor Signs California Budget With Anti-Poverty Efforts
headline.print_headline: Governor Signs California Budget With Anti-Poverty Efforts

docs.snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown signed a spending plan Wednesday that uses California's growing surplus to fund new initiatives aimed at providing relief to the poor....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown signed a spending plan Wednesday that uses California's growing surplus to fund new initiatives aimed at providing relief to the poor.

headline.main: North Dakota Tribal Panel Wants to Regulate Oil Development
headline.print_headline: North Dakota Tribal Panel Wants to Regulate Oil Development

docs.snippet: Tribal leaders from an oil-prolific portion of North Dakota's Fort Berthold Reservation say they can't count on federal or state regulators — or their own tribal government — to monitor the boom, so they are moving to do it themselves....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tribal leaders from an oil-prolific portion of North Dakota's Fort Berthold Reservation say they can't count on federal or state regulators — or their own tribal government — to monitor the boom, so they are moving to do it themselves.

headline.main: Ohio Man Who Killed 5 Found Dead of Apparent Prison Suicide
headline.print_headline: Ohio Man Who Killed 5 Found Dead of Apparent Prison Suicide

docs.snippet: An inmate convicted in 2000 of killing three teenage girls and a Bible studies teacher in Ohio and a fellow prisoner in 2012 has been found dead of an apparent suicide in his cell....
docs.lead_paragraph: An inmate convicted in 2000 of killing three teenage girls and a Bible studies teacher in Ohio and a fellow prisoner in 2012 has been found dead of an apparent suicide in his cell.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler Recalls Jeep SUVs for Water Leak Problem
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler Recalls Jeep SUVs for Water Leak Problem

docs.snippet: Fiat Chrysler is recalling 164,000 Jeep Cherokee SUVs worldwide to install shields that stop water from getting into the power rear lift gate controls....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler is recalling 164,000 Jeep Cherokee SUVs worldwide to install shields that stop water from getting into the power rear lift gate controls.

headline.main: Rare Klimt Portrait Brings $39 Million at Auction
headline.print_headline: Klimt Portrait Brings $39 Million at Auction

docs.snippet: The full-length “Portrait of Gertrud Loew,” painted in 1902, exceeded its high estimate at a Sotheby’s auction in London....
docs.abstract: The full-length “Portrait of Gertrud Loew,” painted in 1902, exceeded its high estimate at a Sotheby’s auction in London.

headline.main: U.S. to Alter Long-Term Detention of Immigrant Families With Children
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Alter Long-Term Detention of Immigrant Families With Children

docs.snippet: U.S. immigration authorities plan to cut back on long-term detention for families with children who entered the country illegally while speeding up how they are processed at detention centers, the homeland security secretary said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. immigration authorities plan to cut back on long-term detention for families with children who entered the country illegally while speeding up how they are processed at detention centers, the homeland security secretary said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Guys, Just Let Your Curls Down

docs.snippet: Curly locks à la Celestin Boutin in the “Death in Venice” movie have emerged as the mop of choice this season, dominating spring/summer 2016 men’s shows like Prada in Milan and, today, Valentino in Paris....
docs.abstract: Curly locks à la Celestin Boutin in the “Death in Venice” movie have emerged as the mop of choice this season, dominating spring/summer 2016 men’s shows like Prada in Milan and, today, Valentino in Paris.

headline.main: Carlos Carrasco, Indians Finally Top Tigers 8-2
headline.print_headline: Carlos Carrasco, Indians Finally Top Tigers 8-2

docs.snippet: Carlos Carrasco kept the AL's best hitting team in check for eight innings and the Cleveland Indians won their first home game against Detroit this season, beating the Tigers — without slugger Miguel Cabrera in the lineup — 8-2 on Wedn...
docs.lead_paragraph: Carlos Carrasco kept the AL's best hitting team in check for eight innings and the Cleveland Indians won their first home game against Detroit this season, beating the Tigers — without slugger Miguel Cabrera in the lineup — 8-2 on Wednesday.

headline.main: Judge to Consider Blocking Kansas Ban on Abortion Method
headline.print_headline: Judge to Consider Blocking Kansas Ban on Abortion Method

docs.snippet: An abortion rights group is asking a Kansas judge to block the state's first-in-the-nation ban on what it says is the most common method for terminating second-trimester pregnancies, contending that the new law would force women to either accept h...
docs.lead_paragraph: An abortion rights group is asking a Kansas judge to block the state's first-in-the-nation ban on what it says is the most common method for terminating second-trimester pregnancies, contending that the new law would force women to either accept higher medical risks or forgo abortions.
